sentences.en: The doctor was killed in crossfire as he went to help the wounded.
sentences.cn: 那位医生去救助伤员时在交叉火力中丧生。

sentences.en: Three innocent bystanders were killed in the crossfire.
sentences.cn: 三个无辜的旁观者在交叉火力中丧生。

sentences.en: They say they are caught in the crossfire between the education establishment and the government.
sentences.cn: 他们说他们被卷入了教育机构和政府之间的争端。
